titleStmt.title: Animadversions upon a letter and paper, first sent to His Highness by certain gentlemen and others in VVales: and since printed, and published to the world by some of the subscribers. By one whose desire and endeavor is, to preserve peace and safety, by removing offence and enmity.
titleStmt.author: Sedgwick, William, 1609 or 10-1669?

notesStmt.note: Prints and replies to the letter and paper.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan. 28 1655. London"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
